T02D1747:117b-1: dharma aa bhi shi ka ma ra ga sa hi /
T02D1747:117b-3: dbang chos rten 'brel 'gro ldog / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1747:117b-4: bla ma mkha' 'gro rdo rje 'chang dbyer med ;
T02D1747:117b-5: / gar bsgom gnad kyi yul der 'dud //
T02D1747:117b-6: bla med rgyud rnams bcud bsdus pa'i //
T02D1747:117b-7: dbang chos rim pa bshad par bya //
T02D1747:117b-8: dbang bzhi'i gdams pa zab mo yis //
T02D1747:117b-9: rang gzhan lhan cig skyes pa des //
T02D1747:117b-10: gzhan rnams dbang du sdud pa yi //
T02D1747:117b-11: srog sngags zab mo 'di nyid la //
T02D1747:117b-12: dbang bzhi'i gdams pa med pa yis //
T02D1747:117b-13: rnam rtog dbang du rnam rtog song //
T02D1747:117b-14: rang nyid gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro //
T02D1747:117b-15: rang srog gcod pa'i stva re yin //
T02D1747:117b-16: dbang po gcig dang tshe gcig la //
T02D1747:117b-17: gang zag bzhi dang rigs can bzhin //
T02D1747:118a-2: dug gsum lam dang rnam rtog lam //
T02D1747:118a-3: mchog thun dngos grub gang bsgrub pa //
T02D1747:118a-4: bsnyen sogs bzhi dang bcu gnad gces //
T02D1747:118a-5: rang rkyen dag las gzhan rkyen 'byung //
T02D1747:118a-6: ltas gcig rtags bzhin shes byas la //
T02D1747:118a-7: bsgrub dang ldog gzhag gdams ngag gces //
T02D1747:118a-8: bla ma sangs rgyas dbyer med mchog / gar bsgom rigs lnga'i skor ldog sogs //
T02D1747:118a-9: mchog thun gnyis kyi bye brag gis //
T02D1747:118a-10: ting 'dzin lnga ldan gdams pa bcas //
T02D1747:118a-11: gzhan yang ting 'dzin du ma las //
T02D1747:118a-12: 'jug par byed pa ma shes na //
T02D1747:118a-13: mchog dang thun mong de la med //
T02D1747:118a-14: de bas gdan gyi gdams pa gces //
T02D1747:118a-15: lus ngag yid gsum rten 'brel kyang //
T02D1747:118a-16: ye shes gcig gis 'gro ldog nges //
T02D1747:118a-17: dad gus bdag gzhan 'gro ldog nges //
T02D1747:118a-18: gcig la gcig brten mtshungs ldan 'grub //
T02D1747:118a-19: phrin las bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi //
T02D1747:118a-20: rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs //
T02D1747:118a-21: stan thog gcig tu bsgom pa gces //
T02D1747:118a-22: bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po gces //
T02D1747:118a-23: khyad par ting 'dzin lnga ldan gces //
T02D1747:118a-24: mi 'gyur bla ma gdams pa gces //
T02D1747:118a-26: zhi dang dngos grub 'byung ba la //
T02D1747:118a-27: lus rtsa ngag rlung sems thig le //
T02D1747:118a-28: dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02D1747:118a-29: dbang bzhi dag las skyes pa'i bu //
T02D1747:118a-31: phyag rgya nyer gnas phyi 'khor sogs //
T02D1747:118a-32: lus ngag yid gsum 'dra mthun dang //
T02D1747:118a-33: kha dog dbyibs sogs rgyud sde bzhin //
T02D1747:118a-34: gang la gang shis rten 'brel gnad //
T02D1747:118a-36: ci bsam 'grub pas blo re bde //
T02D1747:118a-37: rang lus gzhan lus gdams pa gcig / rang sems gtso bor gyur pa las //
T02D1747:118a-38: rnal 'byor bo rang bya mi dgos //
T02D1747:118a-39: bla med theg pa chen po yin //
T02D1747:118a-40: bde shas che ba'i rigs kyis ni //
T02D1747:118a-41: rigs ldan shes dang sgyu rtsal shes //
T02D1747:118a-43: tha mal spangs pa gnad du gces //
T02D1747:118a-44: bla med snod rung snod byas nas //
T02D1747:118a-45: nyon mongs rang dbang lam dang 'dres //
T02D1747:118b-0: @118b srid sel rigs rgyud spel zhes bya //
T02D1747:118b-1: bzhi ldan gdan dang mthun pas bsgyur //
T02D1747:118b-2: mthon dman skyon yon bzang ngan sogs //
T02D1747:118b-3: 'dun pa'i sems kyis bsgyur bar bya //
T02D1747:118b-4: spros bcas spros med shin tu spros med dang //
T02D1747:118b-5: phyogs las rnal 'byor don gyi spyod pa bya //
T02D1747:118b-6: phyi nang gsang ba de nyid rig ma yin //
T02D1747:118b-7: bsten thabs dus tshod gnas skabs 'dod yon dang //
T02D1747:118b-8: khyad par ro drug rig ma gnad kyis bcad //
T02D1747:118b-9: 'bras bu bzhi dang dbyer med phyag rgya'i gnad //
T02D1747:118b-11: la la nyon mongs 'gyod rjes gcod //
T02D1747:118b-12: nyon mongs che ba bde ba che //
T02D1747:118b-13: de phyir stong pa'i rgyas 'debs gnad //
T02D1747:118b-14: gzhan don slob pa'i zung 'jug yin //
T02D1747:118b-15: bya byed bral sogs lhun grub yin //
T02D1747:118b-16: dam tshig bzhi dang sdom pa bzhi //
T02D1747:118b-17: dam bca' bzhi bcas mchog dbang bskur //
T02D1747:118b-18: phyogs bcu'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1747:118b-20: padma bzhi la thig le bzhi //
T02D1747:118b-21: bde ba bcu drug skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1747:118b-22: rang snang ye shes gzugs can gyis //
T02D1747:118b-23: padma lte ba'i dbus na gnas //
T02D1747:118b-24: nor bu'i rtse mor gnas pa'i tshe //
T02D1747:118b-25: mar me lta bur mya ngan 'das //
T02D1747:118b-26: phyag rgya bzhi dang sku bzhir bstan //
T02D1747:118b-27: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos sku yin //
T02D1747:118b-28: gsang sngags tshul chen theg pa 'dir //
T02D1747:118b-29: bla ma bzang pos bzung ba rnams //
T02D1747:118b-30: zla ba drug la sogs pas ni //
T02D1747:118b-31: 'grub pas su zhig 'dir mi 'jug / rten 'brel rdo rje'i tshig drug 'di //
T02D1747:118b-34: thabs shes gnyis su 'brel byas nas //
T02D1747:118b-36: mkha' 'gro'i dmod bzhin da ltar de 'grub shog /
T02D1747:118b-37: dpal n'a ro pas mdzad pa'i dbang chos kyi gdams
T02D1747:118b-40: / rgya gar gyi bla ma te phu pa dang /
